channel.title: Website of Shruthi Rao
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Shruthi Rao

item.title: MaskifAI
item.description: MaskifAI is a mask detection web app which can be used by an organization to ensure that their employees wear a mask while entering the workspace.

item.title: TeachUs
item.description: TeachUs is a community by teachers, for teachers. The onset of the COVID-19 pandemic has forced both students and teachers alike to rely on online resources to learn and teach.

item.title: Of opportunities and beautiful journeys! - Mentorship Program 2.0 Week 5
item.description: The Women Who Code Delhi Mentorship Program 2.0 had one goal â€” to connect undergraduate women in STEM fields with women leaders in technology and thus further their professional development.

item.title: Of projects and DS Algo! - Mentorship Program 2.0 Week 4
item.description: The fourth week of the WWCD Mentorship Program was focussed on any topic of study that we wanted to pick.

item.title: Of scholarships and applications! - Mentorship Program 2.0 Week 3
item.description: The third week of the Mentorship Program focussed mainly on scholarships.

item.title: Of GitHub and projects! - Mentorship Program 2.0 Week 2
item.description: After an exciting first week of the WWC Mentorship Program, followed an eventful second week.

item.title: Of emails, Hangouts and lists! - Mentorship Program 2.0 Week 1
item.description: It all started with an eagerly awaited email from the Women Who Code team on the 18th of January.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey! I am Shruthi Rao, a sophomore pursuing Computer Science and Engineering at Indira Gandhi Delhi Technical University for Women.
